---
name: Agent context / planning
about: Capture project context, constraints, and work decomposition for agents
labels: documentation
---

## Mission / Goal
Single-sentence mission statement and link to the originating request.

## Current Stage
Where we are in the lifecycle (e.g., discovery, MVP build, feature hardening).

## Constraints & Non-Goals
List constraints, guardrails, and explicitly deferred items.

## Background Inputs
Links to design docs, checklists, TODO items, and any prior decisions that must be honored.

## Proposed Work Outline
Ordered list of atomic steps or commits. Reference the TODO backlog when possible.

## Risks / Unknowns
Questions, assumptions, and validation steps.

## Agent Handoffs
What context to pass between agents (files, prompts, notes) and how to surface it (issue comments, PR descriptions).
